评论概述: The perfect casual cute closet staple!
评论详情: I absolutely love this romper dress!! It is so incredibly comfortable and cute! I have gotten so many compliments when I wear it out! It is great quality material and is so universal that it can be worn for a variety of events! You can dress it up or wear it casually and be active in it! It has large/deep pockets that are great for keys/small wallets. I bought a cropped white tank to go underneath of it which completed the look! There is a full-body romper with shorts that is fitted, but not too tight or restricting. It is the perfect length and it's straps are not uncomfortable at all! The color is so perfect and looks exactly like the picture! I would buy this again and again!!

I have been wanting one of these dresses for awhile and had looked at several other vendors before settling on this one. I went with Anrabess based on the size chart, adjustable straps, and reviews. I got a large and am glad. It fits rather well and is quite comfortable. I have a smaller bust with big ribs, so I have to tighten the straps all the way. I have to undo them when I need to use the bathroom.  I am 5’0 and the dress hits mid-kneecap. I wear roughly a 12/14 in womens and 13/15 in juniors pants with a flat butt. Tops are anywhere from Large to 1x depending on brand. I have a C-section belly with a mind of its own. The last time I was measured for a bra (VS about 2018) I was a 40C. The large fits me really well. It doesn’t cling to my midsection. The bodysuit underneath is fitted but far from “too tight”. It doesn’t dig, the shorts don’t ride up. Don’t expect it to fit like shapewear. I’m not super fond of the design of the pockets, it reminds me of Pippi Longstocking. However I am thankful to have pockets. This one did not have the bra inserts in the top like other dresses I viewed. It’s fine with a sports bra underneath. I have never been a dress person but wanted something fun and different but still comfy for summer. It’s 97F as of about 15 minutes ago and I don’t feel overheated. I did worry about that given it’s two layers technically but it feels nice. I have worn it for a few hours today while running errands and the sweat marks are minimal. I got this as a Mother’s Day gift and will be getting more for summer. I could sleep in this if I wanted because it’s that comfy.  *excuse the yucky mirror in my pics. I was in the bathroom in the storage building.

Bought this as an easy outfit to run errands in while carrying around babies / dogs and it's super cute and comfy! It doesn't have a built in bra / liners (knew that before I bought it), and it does run big, so maybe size down one size. Other than that, it's a great one-piece item to have around for cleaning house, errands, working out, etc.

Love this!  Perfect for any age! I ordered the light pink!  First, after reading the reviews I decided to order the small!  I am 5'4 125lbs. Small, petite shape.  I could have maybe ordered the XS.  The only reason I may want the smaller size is so the shorts, the body shorts underneath would fit a bit more snug, more slimming!  It is comfortable!  Great quality fabric! Doesn't look cheap!  The length is just above the knees with adjustable straps so it is appropriate for any occasion, work, running errands, summer night out, picking kids up from school!  And the pockets, you can't go wrong with this item!  This is a must have in your summer wardrobe!  Buy one and you will want to buy a second one!  I am already looking at the color options!

I think most normal people who aren’t overly critical of their body would love this. Easy to throw on and super comfy!  I would kill to find this dress without the built in body suit! I would need to wear a tank under it to feel comfortable but by then there would be a bra, tank top, built in body suit and then dress. Far too many layers for me. I love the idea of this but I pee way too much to have to take it off eveytime, the straps don’t seem quite strong enough to constantly be pulled and tugged eveytime you have to take it down. It’s super cute but if you need more coverage around your under arms/chest (my major insecurity areas) this may not be for you as it hangs relatively low around the arms.

So easy to throw on and run errands, brunch, walk around town. Can easily be dressed up a bit with a jean jacket for brunch with friends. The color is beautiful and the dress is excellent quality. This brand makes good quality clothes!! I like to wear an undershirt with build in bra, so I don’t have to mess with a strapless. The built in romper provides amazing coverage at the arms, so a bra would be totally hidden. So much better than having to pay for the brand name, and honestly, I like this one more! Such an amazing value. The length is great and not mini at all. The under romper is stretchy, so it’s bump friendly too!

I ordered 2 colors and came back for more. This is the perfect casual dress for basically every summer activity. It's so comfortable and cute I know I will be wanting to wear these dresses all the time. It is pretty easy to get in and out of. It does help to loosen the straps all the way before you try to take the dress off or pull it on.  I found that if you don't, the underarm area can tend to get stretched out looking.  The romper shorts are a good length. They want to ride up on me a bit, but most shorts do so that's not a major issue. I also need to have a nice looking sports bra on underneath because much of my bra is still exposed. Like even if I was wearing a strapless bra, it would still be visible under the arms. I don't mind the look with the sports bra, and it gives you more options on color combos with the dress. The dresses have washed well so far. Great buy, for me!

I would have given it 5 stars but the straps could be a little softer/wider and it's a bit of work if you have to use the restroom... However... I am planning on buying 1 more in another color :) Fit wise - I am a formerly athletic/active woman wearing a 38/ F. Most my weight is muscle and chest but I have some age weight on me now as well. Knowing these things hopefully helps visualize the fit. The XL fits me snug but comfy - other than the straps that dig a bit into my shoulders. It probably wasn't made for carrying these overgrown monsters.. so I wouldn't judge it by that 🤣

290 pounds and 5’8”. Bought a XXL and it fit after some stretching it out so it didn’t hug my tummy. Made it work. The shorts underneath weren’t snug or didn’t ride up. Adjustable straps than ran long so I had to adjust them a lot. Good color options. Would recommend
Great fit and very comfy.  Love the material
I love this it fit great and fabric is soft

I’m 5’3”, 180 lbs, I ordered the Large. I think the material feels nice, but my only complaint is that I wish the length was shorter bc I’m short. I think it’s about 1-2 inches too long for me. I may have it altered. The underneath bodysuit has zero compression to it so it won’t help if you have an apron belly like I do. However the overlaying dress doesn’t seem the cling to my belly thank goodness. Also if you have a big bottom it will make it stand out. Either way, I think I will keep it regardless. I always have a hard time with rompers because of my bigger backside and I think this dress I can make work, as if I sized up to an XL, I think it would be too big up top. Definitely needs a longer sports bra or tank top underneath. Also I was hoping the material would be a little thinner for summer, bc it feels like a thick cotton.

评论概述: Fun, but arm holes are big
评论详情: I'm 5'4" 125lbs and ordered the small in Coffee.  The color is true to the picture. Love this for a stay at home/run errands outfit.  I like the loose, drapey fit, but the arm holes are just a bit too loose for me. Wish it came in an XS.  The other thing is, once you take it off, its like a puzzle to get it back in the right configuration to put it away!  It gets all tangled up because of the insdie body suit versus the outside dress that are attached!  Love it though and would buy it again, maybe with another vendor that sells the XS so the arm holes aren't super loose.

Wore this around Disney World in August and it was perfect. I wore the 2xl and I needed to wear my sports bra or a tank for chest coverage, otherwise it wouldn't have been enough for me. Super comfy. The shorts inside the jumper were just a little bit shorter than I would pick on my own, but it worked out. I was really happy with the skirt length. And the pockets! I saw so many of these on people walking around the park. They are really easy to wear. My teenage daughter got a matching one and she loves hers too.

I am 5'7, about 180 lbs. This dress is perfect for all-day events; I went golfing. It's a t-shirt material with pockets and an under-spandex layer. The straps are super long and even tightened all the way they were still to long - only downside though

评论概述: Did not recommend on a hot humid day or 90 temps
评论详情: I first got a xtra small from reviews saying it runs large. Maybe they are not sewn all the same. I returned for a small. I am 5’2 , 36A, 27 waist , 38 hips. The small fit but I would rather the inside be loose because there is not much airflow. The liner is the same material as the outside of it. It’s very soft I have the strap Mid way . Great length for myself. It would be more comfortable with wearing a cami or bathing suit underneath since it does have a little bit of a gap . The mint green is a very pale soft color . Just like it’s shown just the right amount of paleness. This is great for a cooler summer day or night. I can’t imagine playing tennis in this on a hot day. 🥵

评论概述: Came with hair on it, but I Love it!
评论详情: When opening the bag I noticed hair like it’s been tried on and returned. Which I understand if it’s been returned, but they didn’t try to even lint roll it or make it look presentable. But I gave it a good ole wash and I love it and it’s super comfortable and cute!

评论概述: Too big, but fabric is nice.
评论详情: The fabric to this is really nice and thick, I tend to get 1-2 sizes larger since I like the baggy fit, this is not one to do this with. I was so self conscious and constantly pulling at the straps and it was just not good. Buy your actual size with this one. The quality of the fabric is great though. I would recommend.
I’m 5’7” and it’s a little short for my torso. The top dips and the bottom is a touch tight. Cute though.

评论概述: Size down if in between sizes
评论详情: This dress is adorable - I returned because it was a tad too big. I am often in between sizes (S/M) and it truly depends on the brand. I got the M and the under layer was just a bit of an awkward fit. Will be buying the S!
I LOVE this dress, it's easy to layer and something I can wear to work. I definitely could've gone one size up because I don't like the way it fits around my belly
I absolutely love this romper!!! Its cute, comfortable and so flattering.  I wore it all summer and into the fall with a little cropped sweater.

Great outfit. Got it immediately tried it on and fell in love. The only reason it has 4 stars instead of 5 is they didn’t think of having to pee when designing the outfit. The built it shorts are great. It can’t be that hard to put in some snaps though. It is a little shorted then I’m used to wearing out but I can get over that with a good tan. Also had to put on a bra underneath because there was no support for the big boob ladies.

I did not have huge expectations for this, but man did I fall in love. It is super cute and extremely comfortable. I love that there are shorts built-in to prevent the dreaded "chub rub" when walking around a lot, especially in my hot climate state. The only complaint I had was that the front went a little lower than I would have liked. I am chesty though so maybe that's a "me" problem. I am 205, 5'5" and a 38DDD and the XL fit me perfectly with a little extra space!

Was influenced by tik tok (ashamed lol) but this is SO comfy and practical for summer. Was able to wear at work (casual wear obviously) and feel comfortable. Fabric is thick and has enough stretch to be comfortable
Definitely not as cute as free people but it’s longer and does the job
I ordered my recommended size and would have preferred a little bit of a tighter fit.
Very cute and comfortable but a little disappointed on the feel of the material. It’s thick but some may have to wear a bra, which is difficult with the cut.
I love this dress so much. Very comfortable but cute. Got a size small and I'm 5'7 and 135 lbs. Fits grreat!

This is a great casual dress for warm weather. It’s comfy and easy to throw on. The fabric is very similar to T-shirt material, not super high quality. I ordered black and it attracted a lot of lint and also showed deodorant stains. However, I don’t think that would be an issue with any of the lighter colors. I am 5’6 130lb and ordered a small. The length was perfect in the front, a tad short in the back. This one does have ADJUSTABLE STRAPS!!! Which I think is very important to have with the cut of this neckline. I added a black sports bra underneath due to it not having a built-in bra. The pockets are roomy and awesome. I have already added another color of this dress in my cart. For the simplicity, comfort, and price I definitely think it will be a great summer staple!
I wore this flying home from FL to TN and it was so comfortable on the plane but also very cute and didn’t make me feel frumpy lol it was very easy on and off for bathroom breaks. Highly recommend!
I love this romper/dress! It’s so comfy! It’s versatile as well.
this romper fit perfectly and it’s so cute with a pair of sneakers for a nice day out!
A little long but cute
This is the perfect summer dress for running errands or travel. Very comfortable, good material but runs big. I would recommend sizing down if you are between sizes.
True to size, comfortable and easy to wash

评论概述: Super comfy and great all around summer dress
评论详情: Definitely like this dress - fits true to size, maybe a lil on the bigger size but I like to be comfy and do not want my clothes too tight. It can be dressed up with a jeans jacket or great to even throw on to run errands. I’m going to wear it to a backyard BBQ today with a white tank and white tennis shoes. It looks cute with a sports bra under it too. Smaller busted ladies could get away with no bra but there’s no shelf bra built in so that’s not comfortable for me. I recommended this dress to a good friend of mine and she’s already ordered it.

This large was a little bit loose on me. If I was to buy another in the same style, I would get a medium. It also hit much lower on my leg than the picture. I am short at 5'2 but it looked a little too long on me.

评论概述: Not for plus size (insert sad face)
评论详情: This is such a cute dress and such a good idea but poorly executed?  You have to take the entire dress combo off to go to the bathroom, which I knew before I bought it so I really can't complain.  It is not very forgiving unless you have a flat tummy, no curves and some acrobatic skills to get the dress off.  Maybe I was doing it wrong but to take the dress off there was not much "give" around neck line/straps to get it down and then you sat there naked because the whole point is you don't have to wear a bra with it.  I kept the dress but would never wear it in public because 1. no bra support 2. the nakedness in the restroom 3. did not hide my flaws.  I wasn't expecting a miracle but you always hope you will find that one amazing piece that makes you feel good about yourself.  This was not it.  Not the dresses fault.

评论概述: Cute, but not the Right Fit
评论详情: This was very cute and I really wanted it to fit. I have a 36E chest and it caused the back to be a bit too tight. If I had gotten a size bigger it would have too long and large everywhere else.

Loved this! I got tons of compliments on it. Was super easy to throw on and was great for walking in all day. The dress does go down quite a bit lower on the chest and armpits so be prepared to wear a tank top or a sports bra (like I'm wearing) under
The cutest romper dress, but fits larger.  I definitely suggest sizing down one size.

It’s cute, I would buy another. I’m typically a MED in something like this. The inner liner fits well but after wearing all day it gets a little stretched out. I could have ordered a small. Will order again.
I anticipated a lighter material this is very heavy material like t-shirt and then of course it's double layered so it's very hot in the summertime however it's nicely made and quality item
Great color (I got rust) and I love the adjustable straps! The “rust” color is more of a pinkish orange and it goes with everything. If I buy another color I’ll probably size down.

评论概述: Very hot! Not for southern state wear!
评论详情: If you are thin and live up north great buy. If you’re overweight and live in the south do not buy! Not flattering for thicker figures. Exceptionally thick material and very uncomfortable and hot to wear!
Very cute but Size down!!

评论概述: Super comfy and perfect for lounging
评论详情: I bought this romper dress because it looked super comfy. The fabric is soft and stretchy, and it is a perfect piece to lounge in or wear to work from home. The color is also bright and vibrant, and I am actually going to buy a couple more in different colors. There are romper shorts built into the dress, and I LOVE the pockets on the front. I would give five starts if there was a built in shelf bra to give support, so I wear a sports bra or tank with a bra underneath. Overall, I would recommend this piece.
liked the fit, comfortable, fun!

I absolutely love this dress! It has been so comfy and cute for summer, as well as a simple maternity outfit! The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is the body suit seemed to be a bit baggy and bigger than expected. However, since I bought this as I was pregnant, I eventually grew into it. The length is also not too short, and hit me mid thigh. I am 5’6 for reference.

Those jumper is so comfortable! I love that it is a little baggy, so it’s more of a casual/sporty fit. The downsides are that the shorts tend to ride up and there is no built-in bra, so I found myself having to wear a sports bra. I got the black one… It does attract quite a bit of lint, but it’s easy to wipe off. However, I will probably purchase another one bc it’s perfect for chasing toddlers!
So perfect for running errands, house work, lunch dates, etc.! I enjoy the adjustable straps and built in onesie.  I feel like I could do anything in this stylish but super comfortable lil thingggg

I’m 36, hate being hot, and have four kids under age 7 I’m chasing all day. This dress is cute to run out of the house in with a sports bra and a baseball hat. I love the built in tank/shorts. Practical, comfortable, nursing friendly. I ordered three colors! Xxl is what I ordered, which is what I order from target/other Amazon sellers and it fits true to size. It is a bit revealing in the bust for my comfort, but I am a 38DDD and used to that so I just wear a sports bra and I feel more covered..

I bought this dress for the DisneyUniversal parks. This dress was perfect. Even though it’s not too light weight, It kept me cool while also making me feel pretty and less worried about how I looked. The straps come with adjustable straps so you can get your size without having to worry about the top being too loose. Probably going to get this in other colors.

It feels like it runs a bit big. And I don’t know if it’s just me but the seam inside the V on the neckline rubs me weird. But it is super cute on and very comfortable. Worth a try. I have the Free People. Reason and I like it better but this is a good alternative and looks just like it, just a bit bigger so size down.

I’m really glad I decided last minute to size down. I’m 5’3 and weigh 180 lbs and I’m typically a size large on most items. I went for a size medium in this dress because I was worried about my short torso. I’m glad I did because it fits perfect. It’s a good material and very comfortable. I would definitely buy another one in another color

I’m 5’4” 163 pounds with most of my weight in my hips and thighs. The measurements of my hips(41”) and waist (33”) told me a large would fit perfectly but it’s a bit roomy and I think a medium would have probably fit better. Neverless it’s still really cute and I wore it all day today running errands on an 85 degree humid day in the Midwest and it was perfect for that. I plan on taking this with me on our vacation to Hershey park next month and I also ordered another in the red.

评论概述: Great quality, runs a little large.
评论详情: Nice woven material, but size down if you’re not busty. The inner lining part was not snug in the least, I bought this dress from a different vendor, size S, and was perfect, however this one runs larger.
It’s very casual and very comfortable, I would hardly call the attached bodysuit shape wear. It is cute although, I feel I probably should have sized down, it’s a bit large for me personally.
I wanted to like the style.  The material was heavy, the fit was unflattering.  Frumpy looking, it was returned

The color is exactly as pictured. The material is thick, and seems well made. I maybe would like something a little thinner for the summer heat. 5'6" 160ish pounds, ordered large I could have went with a medium

The fabric of this feels good on the body, very soft and stretchy. The color (I chose brown) was perfect. However, this does not fit the same as the brand that it’s similar too. It fits much longer and wider. I took an XS, which is my normal size. Because I’m on the shorter side, this didn’t look as good and sort of like a bag. Good comfort though and it has built in shorts and a bra which is great for running errands or with my kids! I didn’t end up keeping though because of the fit.
Great quality. Runs a little big.

This is cute and easy to wear, but don’t be misled into thinking the liner is shapewear.  There is no shaping and you still need a bra.  I also wish the liner shorts were longer.  They ride up and become briefs and I’m always pulling them down.  These are fine for casual wear - but not good for any kind of active sports.  You will get chub rub if you walk any long distances on them.

Great lounge around the house dress. It’s comfy and has nice fit. I agree with sizing down. There is zero chest support and no bra option that you could wear without the straps showing - which is why I say it’s a lounge dress because you have to wear it braless.
The dress is great- comfortable and flattering but the shorts underneath are way too short for me and keep riding up.  It would be perfect if they were a little longer

Wanted to love these didn't feel bad material seems good and comfortable they just run really big im usually a small or medium got medium and it fit like an x large pretty sure I would need like an extra small

Very cute and fashionable romper. This is my second purchase with this company and I am very happy with their products. Love the color, feel of the fabric and the way it washes.  The only con I have is that the shorts are too short and can tend to ride up. I am 5’4, size 16-20. I ordered the xxl and returned it for the xl. I ordered the teal and look forward to being able to order more colors. Worth the buy!
Loved this set, so comfortable!

评论概述: Love this! Flattering and comfortable on taller ladies
评论详情: I bought this after seeing a bunch of people wearing it on Instagram and it actually turned out to be a good find. Its super cute and comforable and actually fits taller-ish people. I'm 5'8" with a long torso and basically no jumpsuit or romper looks good or fits, but this one is great.

Like the dress especially in this hot weather. Was hoping it would be a bit more spandex material and less cotton but thts probably on me for not checking. Also a bit more stiff than the picture makes it seem

I’m usually a medium but wish I would’ve ordered a small.  It is very baggy on me and I was hoping it would fit a little tighter, especially the biker shorts underneath.  Overall, very comfy and cute!

Bought a couple of these because after a tummy tuck and some weight loss I can’t wear regular shorts or leggings anymore—crotch bags in everything, can’t get a waist to fit after going over big thighs either. This works in that instance and is cut though the whole thing has to be taken off to toilet.  I could wish the legs were a bit longer in the shorts part because they do roll up but I’ll have to live with that to have the skirt over the shorts that don’t cause a saggy crotch. Fabric seems nice enough in the grey, denser weave than a mere tshirt; love the patch pockets for carrying stuff.  I’m 5’5”, 265 pounds, wearing a snug xxl; but I’m muscular so if you’re flabby this won’t work for you.
Super cute, but really long, and it can't be altered because of the pockets.
Very comfy! Perfect for postpartum

评论概述: Cute but pretty sure I got someone's used return
评论详情: When I opened the package the outfit was crumpled up like it was shoved inside. Then when I opened it up out of the package there was dog hair all over it, along with some persons hair. I'm pretty sure someone either used it once and returned it or tried it on and left it out, as the straps had been messed with and the inner lining was the wrong way. The outfit itself is cute and comfortable but I am highly disappointed in the quality assurance of returns. Isn't this why they have a used but in good/great condition option? Keeping as I don't want to deal with the hasel of returning and repurchasing, just going to wash it.

Fit great and washed well. however after washing the first time before wearing I discovered a small cut in the back of the garment that looked like it was made with scissors. I tried to repair it but it's not perfect and definitely shows. Nothing I did caused that cut. The garment was in a plastic bag- I removed it, tried it on quickly, removed the tag and put in the washer. So, not thrilled. I didn't return it because I had washed it-

Wanted like a sweat wicking type of material.. this isn’t it. It’s like a kinda thick stretchy cotton blend. Got an xsmall cause I wanted it fit like athletic wear, fits more like a small. I think it’s cuter if your got more bust/behind to fill out, but as a thin girl it looks just alright. Material kind of sticks together so the skirt kind of sticks to the inside built in shorts when I move around vs sliding off each other in a seamless flow

I originally ordered the FP version of this dress in a size S and it was way too short on me. This version is an appropriate length and has a flattering fit for a much better price. It has a bit of extra material than the FP version and I feel like I could even size down to the XS. It's a great maternity dress as well and hides the baby bump! Definitely ordering in more colors for the summer!!

Description says built in shapewear, but make no mistake, it’s not shapewear, it’s just lined.  But I like it anyways and it’s great to throw on after a long day of work to relax.  But it by no means offers any support.
True to size, comfortable, and good quality. Love this dress with built in shorts.
Just Meh. Cute to lounge in. Wouldnt wear out. Looks more like loungewear. Material kind of thick

I love that this tennis dress is a designer look for less. I recommend sticking to your true size. I'm 5'2, slim, and I purchased small. It was little loose, so I probably could have done an extra small, but it's not so loose that it's too oversized. I love that this can be worn as your outfit for going on a walk, but also it can be worn as a cover up. That offers a lot of versatility, while still being cute and comfy, and gives you more bang for your buck. I highly recommend!

Love this little outfit! I would recommend sizing down though. I’m 5’4” about 115lbs and I got a size small. It was a bit big and since I have a smaller chest I had to tighten the straps all the way for full coverage. Very comfortable and the material is soft. Love that there are attached shorts
Love this jumper!!! Just like Freepeople but a fraction of the cost!!! I want one in every color! True to size, great fabric and comfortable.

This is for all my big arm girls. Wear the dang thing! This is so freaking cute & it’s so comfy! I shy away from spaghetti strapped clothing my entire life & decided to take a chance on this & im so glad I did! It’s the perfect length, doesn’t suck you in too much & the straps are super easy to adjust. I’m in love!
Love this but it runs really big

I’m sure it’s cute on someone it fits, but I bought an xl (I’m usually a large but I followed what Amazon recommended) and it was absolutely massive. Probably needed a medium. Color, stretch, and fabric were all nice though. Deep functional pockets. Just beware that it’s big
I’m 5’1 and got a medium. It runs down to about my mid thigh. Wish I would of got a small bit M looks fine
Ordered an XS- it's very oversized. Wish it were a little more form fitting but it's still cute for a super casual dress.
Would size down! I got the navy and love it.

评论概述: Cute but didn't like the fit
评论详情: Cute but didn't like the neck line, seemed to be a little looser than I had wanted. The rest of the areas fit well.
Great length and fit! True to size! I love that the straps are adjustable! Washes well! Great for on the go!
Absolutely adore this dress. Could have sized down as a the large fits a little loose. Wore for a whole day & just kept getting looser. Considering purchasing another but in M.
I loved this! True to size. Easy to slip on and off. The only downside is it is hand wash only! Great addition to the closet!

评论概述: Good quality, not ideal fit up top
评论详情: The quality of this product is excellent, but the fit of the bult in bra was a bit tight in the under arms in the sizes I purchased. I am by no means buff or have extra fat in my arms, back and shoulders but it pulled and left uncomfortable marks/red indents in those areas. I wanted to love this because everywhere else was so loose and comfy, but overall couldn't put up with the tightness and digging in the chest and back.
Very comfortable but needs a shelf bra support. Also runs big if you want it fitted like I do. I’m am XL and have to get size Medium in this.
Super cute and a great dupe, but it is huge. I am normally a small/medium, and I got a small. However, if I were to order again, I would have gotten and xs.
This dress is very cute and comfortable. My daughter is in college and loves wearing these. She can throw it on and go
Fits true to size. Very comfy and washes well. Perfect for summer days!
